Through original programming, documentaries, and expert-led discussions, MHTN aims to increase awareness, provide valuable information, and encourage open conversations about mental well-being.

programme.title: Quo Vadis TV
programme.desc: Quo Vadis TV is committed to sharing the Biblical message in a way that makes Christian living practical, realistic, and attainable. Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

programme.title: Panhandle
programme.desc: John Sands (Rod Cameron), a reformed outlaw living in a small Mexican town, learns that his brother has been killed in the Texas Panhandle, and he sets out to investigate. When he arrives, he's confronted by a trio of gunslingers working for Matt Garson (Reed Hadley), a local gambler and saloon owner. He also begins to court June O'Carroll (Anne Gwynne), Garson's secretary. John soon grows to believe Garson is responsible for his brother's death, leading to a final showdown.

programme.title: Stagecoach
programme.desc: John Ford's landmark Western revolves around an assorted group of colorful passengers aboard the Overland stagecoach bound for Lordsburg, New Mexico, in the 1880s. An alcoholic philosophizer (Thomas Mitchell), a lady of ill repute (Claire Trevor) and a timid liquor salesman (Donald Meek) are among the motley crew of travelers who must contend with an escaped outlaw, the Ringo Kid (John Wayne), and the ever-present threat of an Apache attack as they make their way across the Wild West.

programme.title: Gunmen From Laredo
programme.desc: A framed Texas rancher (Robert Knapp) escapes from prison for a showdown with a saloonkeeper (Walter Coy).

programme.title: Guns of Diablo
programme.desc: A wagon master is confronted by a man he wounded years before in episodes from "The Travels of Jaimie McPheeters.".

programme.title: Charro!
programme.desc: A reformed outlaw's (Elvis Presley) old gang tries to frame him for the theft of a jeweled Mexican cannon.

programme.title: The Tall T
programme.desc: An outlaw (Richard Boone) and his men hold an heiress (Maureen O'Sullivan), her cowardly husband and a rancher (Randolph Scott).

programme.title: Big Jake
programme.desc: A rancher's (John Wayne) wife (Maureen O'Hara) summons him home to hunt down the outlaw (Richard Boone) and gang who kidnapped his grandson.

programme.title: Guns of Diablo
programme.desc: A wagon master is confronted by a man he wounded years before in episodes from "The Travels of Jaimie McPheeters.".

programme.title: Kansas City Confidential
programme.desc: An ex-convict (John Payne) is framed for a bank holdup done by a police captain (Preston Foster) and men wearing masks.

programme.title: Whirlwind Raiders
programme.desc: The Durango Kid (Charles Starrett) and his singing sidekick (Smiley Burnette) stop bogus Texas lawmen.

programme.title: The Return of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: A murder investigation leads Holmes and Watson on a wild goose chase.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Dodge City and Fort Dodge get into a political war when the governor grants a special election to determine the new seat of Ford County; a conflicted Earp reluctantly follows Mayor Kelley's order to stop Fort Dodge from rigging the election.

programme.title: The Soldier and the Lady
programme.desc: Jules Verne's hero Michael Strogoff (Anton Walbrook) and his friend (Elizabeth Allan) get the czar's message to troops in Siberia.

programme.title: That Texas Jamboree
programme.desc: In 1890, Curt Chambers, the new sheriff of Crescent City, is disgraced when the crooked mayor forces him to shut down a popular medicine show. To save his reputation and a romance, Curt has the medicine tested to prove its value.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Kate decides it is time for Betty Jo to put down the books and set out to find a significant other.

programme.title: NECTAR TRI-PILLOW -Cooler, Comfy, Better Sleep! Buy One Get One FREE!
programme.desc: Discover the Nectar Tri-Comfort Cooling Pillow for the ultimate sleep experience! Adjustable to three firmness levels to provide customized support and cooling all night long. Order NOW to get a second pillow FREE, plus a 30-night home trial!

programme.title: The Tall T
programme.desc: An outlaw (Richard Boone) and his men hold an heiress (Maureen O'Sullivan), her cowardly husband and a rancher (Randolph Scott).

programme.title: Day of the Evil Gun
programme.desc: A man (Arthur Kennedy) joins with a gunfighter (Glenn Ford) and a scout (Dean Jagger) to find his wife and children, kidnapped by Apaches.

programme.title: Cheyenne Autumn
programme.desc: A cavalry captain (Richard Widmark) is ordered to stop 300 Cheyennes migrating from Oklahoma to Wyoming.

programme.title: Big Jake
programme.desc: A rancher's (John Wayne) wife (Maureen O'Hara) summons him home to hunt down the outlaw (Richard Boone) and gang who kidnapped his grandson.

programme.title: Hondo
programme.desc: An Indian scout attempts to escort a homesteader's wife and her son back to safety after her husband deserts her during an Apache attack. When she refuses to go, he stays on to help and, over time, forms a strong bond with both her and her son.

programme.title: The Long Voyage Home
programme.desc: In the early day of World War II, the crew of English cargo ship the SS Glencairn -- including Swede Olsen (John Wayne), Englishman Smitty (Ian Hunter), American Yank (Ward Bond), and Irishmen Driscoll (Thomas Mitchell) and Cocky (Barry Fitzgerald) -- is sailing from the West Indies to Baltimore. Upon their arrival, their new cargo -- a load of dynamite -- puts the men ill at ease, as does the chance that there may be a Nazi spy on board and the general loneliness of seafaring.

programme.title: The Eagle Has Landed
programme.desc: During World War II, Nazi officer Max Radl (Robert Duvall) devises a plan to kidnap or kill the British prime minister. Approved by German Cmdr. Heinrich Himmler (Donald Pleasence), the scheme moves forward with Col. Kurt Steiner (Michael Caine) leading the mission, aided by Liam Devlin (Donald Sutherland), an Irishman with a deep hatred of England. As the plan unfolds, it seems to be going well -- until certain events threaten the group's shot at success.

programme.title: The Return of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Holmes investigates a death and the disappearance of plans for a secret submarine.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Earp finds himself caught between Doc Holliday and the rest of Dodge City when Doc begins work on a fabricated history of the city's founders.

programme.title: That Texas Jamboree
programme.desc: In 1890, Curt Chambers, the new sheriff of Crescent City, is disgraced when the crooked mayor forces him to shut down a popular medicine show. To save his reputation and a romance, Curt has the medicine tested to prove its value.

programme.title: Ministry - Your Words Have Power with Joyce Meyer
programme.desc: Your words hold incredible power; today, Joyce reveals how the things you say can impact your life in profound ways.

programme.title: Word of God Ministries
programme.desc: Pastor James McMenis and his wife Chrissy are dedicated to winning the lost to Jesus and making disciples of the saved. Their goal is to bring clarity to the Word of God, making it life-applicable to people everywhere.

programme.title: The Catholic Mass
programme.desc: The Heart of the nation Sunday mass brings the beauty and traditions of the Catholic faith.

programme.title: Perry Stone
programme.desc: Religious teachings from Perry Stone.

programme.title: Paid Programming
programme.desc: Paid programming.

programme.title: Day of the Evil Gun
programme.desc: Returning home after disappearing three years ago, former gunslinger Lorn Warfield (Glenn Ford) finds that an Apache raiding party has kidnapped his wife and children. Though he has renounced violence, he now takes up his gun and joins forces with his neighbor, Owen Forbes (Arthur Kennedy). Complicating matters, Forbes is engaged to Warfield's wife, who believed her husband was dead. As they pursue the Apaches, the two men are joined by an Indian trader, Jimmy Noble (Dean Jagger).

programme.title: Cheyenne Autumn
programme.desc: Large-scale frontier epic telling the true story of a band of Cheyenne Indians who, starved nearly to extinction on an inhospitable reservation, embark on the long trek back to their distant ancestral homelands in Wyoming, despite opposition from the US Army. Their journey revives old hatreds - and the threat of war.

programme.title: The Nebraskan
programme.desc: When his Indian assistant, Wingfoot (Maurice Jara), is accused of murdering a Sioux chief, Army scout Wade Harper (Phil Carey) brings him to Fort Kearney, Neb., where Colonel Markham (Regis Toomey) insists the young man has the right to a fair trial rather than handing him over to the Sioux. While in jail, Wingfoot is forced to escape with ruthless prisoner Reno Benton (Lee Van Cleef). Wade sets out with a small party to rescue his friend, with the Sioux right behind him.

programme.title: Hondo
programme.desc: An embittered Indian scout attempts to escort a homesteader's wife and her son back to safety after her cowardly husband deserts her during an Apache attack. When she refuses to go, the scout stays on to help for a while and, over time, forms a strong bond with both her and her son.

programme.title: West Side Story
programme.desc: A musical in which a modern day Romeo and Juliet are involved in New York street gangs. On the harsh streets of the upper west side, two gangs battle for control of the turf. The situation becomes complicated when a gang members falls in love with a rival's sister.

programme.title: Cash McCall
programme.desc: Wealthy hotshot Cash McCall (James Garner) makes his money by purchasing unsuccessful businesses, whipping them into shape and then selling them for a huge profit. When Cash comes across Austen Plastics, a small manufacturing corporation on its last legs, he realizes it might be a gamble to buy the company. But when Cash finds out that the company's owner, Grant (Dean Jagger), is the father of his old flame, Lory (Natalie Wood), he buys the business just to get a second chance at romance.

programme.title: Calamity Jane
programme.desc: In the lonely Deadwood, Dakota, territory, sharpshooter Calamity Jane (Doris Day) falls for cavalry Lt. Danny Gilmartin (Philip Carey) when she is forced to rescue him from the Indians. Recognizing that the women-starved townsmen long for a "real" woman, Calamity journeys to Chicago to bring back famous singer Adelaid Adams, but mistakenly brings her maid Katie instead. Heartbroken when Danny falls for Katie, Calamity all but ignores her jovial friend Wild Bill Hickok (Howard Keel).

programme.title: The Return of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: A curse may be the cause of Sir Charles' death.

programme.desc: The Cisco Kid (Gilbert Roland) and Pancho (Martin Garralaga) try to help an unhappy bride.

programme.title: Squawk on the Street

programme.title: Money Movers

programme.title: Halftime Report

programme.title: Closing Bell

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Luke Stars goes missing before his Royal Concert in Barkingburg and Sweetie attempts to take over the event; animals overrun Barkingburg Castle while the Princess is away, forcing Ryder and the "PAW Patrol" to get them under control.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When Rocky goes missing at Uncle Otis' cabin in the woods, the PAW Patrol needs to solve the mystery of the Werepuppy; on Cowboy Day at the Wingnuts Dude Ranch, Mayor Goodway braves the hazards of the ranch while sleepwalking.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Jake's family cuckoo clock slides down the mountainside with Chickaletta stuck inside; mysterious holes appear all over Ms. Marjorie's yard.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When the bouncy turkey from the Thanksgiving feast at City Hall flies away with Mayor Humdinger and his kittens, the pups must save the day; an extremely strong wind suddenly sweeps up all the surfers in the Adventure Bay Windsurfing Race.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: A freak snowstorm hits while Alex and Mr. Porter are camping on a tropical island; Mr. Porter is delivering his fizzy pickles to people around town when a bumpy road shakes up the deliveries and causes the pickle juice to spill.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Yumi's new Robo-Corn Plucker goes haywire; Ryder and the "PAW Patrol" must get it under control; Daring Danny X, dressed as a "Bird X" mascot, gets carried away by a couple of eagles.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Rocky and the pups fix an old junk car for Ace Sorensen's birthday; Adventure Bay works hard to earn the record for having the world's highest tower of pizzas.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When an ice floe carrying three penguins lands in the jungle, the pups must get the birds back to their frosty home; Daring Danny is locked out of the lighthouse Turbot left him to look after, with a freighter headed his way.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Mayor Humdinger's plan to win the giant melon contest goes off the rails when his "melon" bounces away and causes chaos all over town; Farmer Al's truck gets stuck on a broken bridge.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Yumi's Yummy Honey is all the buzz when it -- and her beehive -- go missing from her farm; Mayor Goodway's purse disappears, along with its precious cargo, Chickaletta.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: A strange odor chases jungle animals away from their homes; after Olivia the Ostrich falls into a canyon, the pups work together to lift her to safety and protect her soon-to-hatch eggs.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: The pups need to find Gustavo Goodway's missing guitar before the evening's campfire concert; Farmer Yumi's new yoga goat class is a hit, until her goats go missing.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: The Turbots are trapped somewhere in the jungle, but their phone cuts out when they try to call the Paw Patrol; after Chickaletta lays an egg, it rolls away and heads through town.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Storm hears Gargamel talking about a talisman that would give him the power to capture the Smurfies' village; she decides to get hold of it first so that she can save the village!

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: To find his way back to the right dimension, Sonic must battle the jungle monster who waged war on his friends and capture the Prism Shard.

programme.title: Despicable Me
programme.desc: Supervillain Gru, a man who delights in all things wicked, hatches a plan to steal the moon. Surrounded by an army of little yellow minions and his impenetrable arsenal of weapons and war machines, Gru prepares to vanquish all who stand in his way. However, nothing in his calculations and groundwork has prepared him for his greatest challenge: three adorable orphan girls who want to make him their dad.

programme.title: The Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: An after-hours break-in to save Boss Baby's job transforms Tim into the daring Tim Templeton: Unleashed.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lori and Bobby find a kitten and decide to raise it together; after telling her family how great her apartment is, Lori’s sisters secretly take over her space.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: The family gets stuck in a traffic jam that leads to all human civility getting thrown out the passenger side window; Jack and Lily attempt to catch a legendary town fish despite horror stories from townsfolk who have tried and failed before them.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: This series follows the Clampett family from the Ozarks to posh Beverly Hills after they strike oil and become millionaires. Banker Mr. Drysdale tries to keep them from foolishly spending their newfound wealth, and he also tries to "civilize" them -- usually succeeding in making a fool of himself in the process.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben Cartwright is the patriarch of an all-male Nevada ranching family. Set during and after the Civil War, "Bonanza" is the story of life on the family's thousand-acre spread, known as the Ponderosa, near Virginia City. Ben has his three sons, each with a different (and deceased) mother. Serious eldest son Adam hopes to follow in his father's footsteps; middle son Hoss is a gentle giant -- physically strong, but sometimes naive; and youngest son Little Joe is the most impetuous and romantic of the offspring.

programme.title: Fauda
programme.desc: After retiring from the Israel Defense Force, Doron is working on a vineyard. He gets roped back into active duty, though, upon learning that an enemy who Doron thought his unit had killed is still alive and plans on attending his brother's wedding. Doron rejoins the IDF team with the intention of going under cover at the wedding, but the plan goes awry when the team's cover is blown. That sets into motion a chaotic chain of events and leads IDF into a manhunt to locate and kill the squad's target.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben Cartwright is the patriarch of an all-male Nevada ranching family. Set during and after the Civil War, "Bonanza" is the story of life on the family's thousand-acre spread, known as the Ponderosa, near Virginia City. Ben has his three sons, each with a different (and deceased) mother. Serious eldest son Adam hopes to follow in his father's footsteps; middle son Hoss is a gentle giant -- physically strong, but sometimes naive; and youngest son Little Joe is the most impetuous and romantic of the offspring.

programme.desc: Faith, determination and human spirit abound in "Fight to Survive," which recounts stories of people's deadly ordeals in the outdoors. Accompanying survivors back to where harrowing events occurred is rock-climber Craig DeMartino, who is featured in the premiere episode. His right leg was amputated below the knee after a climbing accident, but he continued in his sport. In 2006 he became the first amputee to free-climb the 3,200-foot face of Yosemite's El Capitan in one day. Other stories tell of sailor Steven Callahan clinging to a raft in the Atlantic, fisherman Dean Ririe trapped by a boulder in icy water, and hiker Ted Porter falling into a glacial crevasse.

programme.desc: The Carnival Sunshine heads to the Cayman islands and then to Cozumel.

programme.desc: Mack and Sofia head south to Miami with their two teenage sons; they both want to live near the water, which means a dock for a boat and yoga by the ocean.

programme.title: Justice With Judge Mablean
programme.desc: Judge Mablean Ephriam, who presided over "Divorce Court" from 1999-2006 as the first star of the revived version of the show, returns to the courtroom genre with his half-hour series that deals with life and the law. programme.title: The Verdict With Judge Hatchett
programme.desc: Judge Glenda Hatchett presided over her self-titled courtroom show from 2000-2008. Now, she returns to the medium with "The Verdict." In the half-hour series, the Atlanta native and former juvenile-court judge rules over small-claims cases brought in front of her. Hatchett's courtroom isn't just about finding someone guilty, though. She also uses her experience dealing with young people and her tough-love approach to help send a message to out-of-control juvenile offenders to try to set them on the right track in their lives.

programme.title: Supreme Justice With Judge Karen
programme.desc: Karen Mills was a county court judge and criminal defense attorney in Florida before turning to TV to preside over her own court shows. In her third effort, "Supreme Justice," Mills tackles small-claims court arbitrations in her compassionate way, to which viewers of her previous shows have grown accustomed. As usual with court shows, cases involve friendships gone bad, money disputes and property damage.

programme.desc: Stacey takes an old, beat-up '66 Mustang and puts some pep back in Its step. He shows you how to replace an old automatic transmission with a quick-shifting Tremec T5 5-speed, and how to lift an old cab or body off a frame without destroying it.

programme.title: Sam's Garage
programme.desc: Sam takes care of some maintenance on a 2005 S2000 he built over 10 years ago.

programme.title: RACER Creator Awards
programme.desc: Capturing the energy, passion and creativity of storytellers redefining car culture; go behind the scenes of the celebrations, heartfelt moments and interviews with industry icons about the future of automotive media.

programme.title: Lost Classics
programme.desc: Tony digs out a rare Mustang that's been hidden under dusty boxes for decades, but the owner has another surprise in store. Then Tony gets a chance to size up a Model A truck at an auction preview before he heads to the famous Spring Carlisle..

programme.title: 2026 DAKAR Rally
programme.desc: Part race and part survival contest, just finishing is a victory in itself. Spanning 14 days and 5,000 miles, this marathon off-road event is a test of endurance that rewards precision and punishes mistakes.

programme.title: The Caine Mutiny
programme.desc: (1954) Oscar-nominated Humphrey Bogart, in one of his finest roles, stars in Edward Dmytryk's gripping drama as Captain Philip Queeg, in charge of a US Navy minesweeper during the war.

programme.title: Film4 Interview Programmes:...
programme.desc: ...Talking Film: Stars and directors talk about the experience of making movies in this compendium of personal and practical reflections.

programme.title: Roman Holiday
programme.desc: (1953) Audrey Hepburn won her only Oscar in this romance as a bored princess who runs away from her duties and meets an American journalist (Gregory Peck), who shows her Rome.

programme.title: How Green Was My Valley
programme.desc: (1941) Walter Pidgeon, Maureen O'Hara and Roddy McDowall star in John Ford's multi-Oscar-winning period drama set in the mining communities of the South Wales Valleys of the 19th century.

programme.title: A Knight's Tale
programme.desc: (2001) Modern swashbuckling medieval action adventure starring Heath Ledger, Shannyn Sossamon and Paul Bettany. A lowly squire jousts his way to the top, with help from Geoffrey Chaucer.

programme.title: The Last Stand
programme.desc: (2013) Thriller starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Johnny Knoxville and Forest Whitaker. A small-town sheriff and his inexperienced staff take on a drug cartel boss who's fleeing to Mexico.

programme.title: Legion
programme.desc: (2010) Apocalyptic action-horror starring Paul Bettany. God's patience runs out and He decides to wipe humanity from the face of the Earth. Can a rebel archangel save us?

programme.title: Dead Presidents

programme.desc: Discovered in a Graveyard: Action-packed drama. Bodie goes on a chase to find an assailant when Doyle is seriously injured after pursuing two suspected terrorists through London. S4 Ep11

programme.title: Robin of Sherwood
programme.desc: The King's Fool: Tales of the legendary outlaw. King Richard is rescued by Robin and his men, but Robin is a little gullible and the King's gratitude is short-lived. S1 Ep6

programme.title: Magnum, P.I.
programme.desc: Limited Engagement: Classic US action drama series. An undercover Thomas befriends two elderly sisters involved in a hit-and-run accident and helps to save them from homelessness. S4 Ep5

programme.title: Kojak
programme.desc: Nursemaid: Detective drama. When an old woman witnesses the murder of a shopkeeper and forced gunrunner, Theo must persuade her to testify and keep her out of the killers' sights. S2 Ep7

programme.title: Boon
programme.desc: For Whom the Chimes Toll: Classic drama. Major Hopkinson, an old man who collects chiming clocks, asks Ken for help after he is terrorised by some thugs that he owes money to. S1 Ep9

programme.title: The Professionals
programme.desc: The Untouchables: Action-packed drama series. Bodie is offered the opportunity of clearing his gambling debts by a foreign diplomat who wants vital secrets from CI5 in exchange. S4 Ep12

programme.title: Minder
programme.desc: Come In T-64, Your Time Is Ticking Away: Drama series about the shady dealings of a loveable rogue. Sabotage causes serious trouble for a minicab firm that Arthur has a stake in. S1 Ep8

programme.title: Formula E Highlights
programme.desc: Hankook Mexico City: Highlights of the second round of the 2025-26 Formula E World Championship from Mexico City as Andretti's Jake Dennis looks to follow up on his win in Sao Paulo.

programme.title: The Motorbike Show
programme.desc: Henry Cole presents the programme for motorcycle enthusiasts - in this edition, Henry's restoration of a Honda race bike comes to a climax and he trains to become a Blood Biker. S6 Ep6

programme.title: Rambo III
programme.desc: Explosive action-adventure film sequel starring Sylvester Stallone, 1988. Reluctant one-man army John Rambo goes into action against brutal Soviet invaders in Afghanistan.

programme.desc: S2026 For most children, summer camp is a time of singing songs by the fire, creating gimp bracelets in arts and crafts, and munching on s'mores. programme.desc: S2026 Oddball anchormen Jeff "The Captain" Carlson and Chris Casey share the latest news in the world of skateboarding in this on-the-cheap, bizarro broadcast designed to appeal to the sensibilities of today's young skaters. Set in what appears to be a wood-paneled basement, our two sick hosts discuss their favorite sport, with top dogs of the skateboard circuit dropping in for a visit. Posers like Mom and Dad might find these freewheeling goofballs a bit sketchy, but their teenage kids will be stoked.

programme.title: Camp Woodward
programme.desc: S2026 For most children, summer camp is a time of singing songs by the fire, creating gimp bracelets in arts and crafts, and munching on s'mores. For a special breed of camper, however, it's the season for practicing a 180 G-Turn or mastering a 50/50 grind. "Camp Woodward" follows young daredevils-in-training into the Pennsylvania Dutch countryside, where action-sports counselors and visiting guest professionals help turn these skateboarding and BMX students into the Tony Hawks and Ryan Nyquists of tomorrow.

programme.title: Jim Shockey's Hunting Adventures
programme.desc: If it's an animal roaming the wild, Jim Shockey has probably hunted it. The veteran wilderness guide and outfitter has tracked game in more than 40 countries and taken in excess of 300 species using bow, muzzleloader and rifle. In addition, Shockey has exclusive guiding territories on Vancouver Island, in the Yukon Territory, in Mexico's Sonoran Desert, and in his native Saskatchewan, all of which helps supply content for the hunting adventures seen in this award-winning series. Jim's daughter Eva, a full-fledged hunter in her own right, joins her dad on many episodes.

Later, Jon heads north for early-summer jigging action - when light tackle, current edges, and subtle movement make all the difference.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E12 War Party While out on an Army mission, Cheyenne shoots a miner in self-defense. He stays to help the miner and his wife, but dangers loom when the Sioux arrive. Their sights are on the miner's wife and his gold.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E13 Deadline While Cheyenne works for Charley Dolan, he finds himself in the middle of a battle between Dolan and Len Garth, a gang leader who forces Dolan and others off their land. Garth soon burns the newspaper office, but Dolan aims to rebuild.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S2 E10 The Trail Gang Ben hires Sam Jackson to help on a cattle drive. Jackson is really Outlaw Johnny Logan. Johnny signed for the drive since it was going near the town of Waycross, where he plans to kill the Waycross sheriff, who is his father.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E5 The Journey Back Mark takes a job on new neighbor Will Temple's ranch but is taken back by Temple's badly scarred face. When a cavalry officer stops by the McCain Ranch looking for a deserter who committed murder, both Mark and Lucas question who Temple really is.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E6 The Decision While repairing a fence on his property, Lucas witnesses a murder. The killer, Corey Hazlett, is the son of a wealthy rancher named Frank Hazlett. When Lucas agrees to testify at Corey's trial, there are threats to harm Mark.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E7 Knight Errant Two old friends of Lucas', Don Chumera De Lardo and Colonel Black, come to the McCain Ranch. They are there to finish a deed of honor, even insisting on a jousting match. Lucas learns that the feud started over a chess game.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E8 Honest Abe A neighbor of Lucas' believes he is Abe Lincoln after being mentally injured in the Civil War. Townspeople go along with his impersonation since he is a kind man. However, when a saloon patron makes fun of him, trouble ensues.

programme.title: Blue Ridge
programme.desc: Ex-Green Beret, Justin Wise, trades in his life of danger for a sheriff badge in a sleepy town at the heart of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Now closer to his ex-wife and daughter, he's ready to settle down and embrace a life without chaos. But trouble has a way of following him. Just when he starts getting adjusted to the simple life, a murder in the community puts the residents on edge and refuels a longtime feud between two of the most powerful families. As Justin and his deputies work the case, he realizes there is more to his new home than meets the eye. Secrets unfold, and motives emerge, leading Justin on a race against time to solve the case before the townspeople take the law into their own hands.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E6 Eight Hours to Die Corrupt Judge Burton seeks justice against those who are responsible for the hanging of his son, including Lucas McCain, who caught him. When Burton discovers that Lucas has a son, he captures Lucas to make him watch Mark suffer the same punishment.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E7 Duel of Honor Italian Count Alfredo Di Montova comes to North Fork. His unique clothing attracts the attention of town bully Sim Groder. When Groder pushes the count too far, Montova initiates a duel, and asks Lucas to assist with the rules.

programme.title: Freedom on the Range
programme.desc: S1 E1 From brave lawmen to rugged cowboys, discover the untold stories of African Americans' cultural significance in the Old West.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E11 John Wesley Hardin: Killer on the Texas Frontier When outlaw John Wesley Hardin murders a sheriff, a hard-charging Texas Ranger joins forces with a cool-headed police detective to hunt the killer. The unlikely duo must learn how to work together to end Hardin's reign of terror once and for all.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E5 Wong Fee Lee Stakes His Claim Chinese immigrant Wong Fee Lee joins a convoy of miners headed to Deadwood, where he hopes to strike gold and start a business. But when the Black Hills Bandits stand in their way, Wong must find the strength to lead his fellow prospectors in battle.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S4 E4 Lucien Maxwell: Legend of New Mexico Having explored the frontier with his good friend Kit Carson, Lucien Maxwell is eager to settle down with his family. But before he can establish a ranching empire in New Mexico, Maxwell must first survive a deadly clash with the Jicarilla Apache.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E22 'Til Death Do Us Part Part 2 The Kid and Lou's wedding day arrives. The advancement of the Civil War forces the riders to take sides. Jesse must choose between his brother Frank or his friends in the Pony Express. An encounter with renegade rebels ends in tragedy.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E10 San Francisco Ben, Hoss and Joe decide to visit San Francisco with some of their ranch hands. The hands vanish into the crowds and while searching for them, Ben finds himself shanghaied and on a ship destined for Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Warrant
programme.desc: Sheriff John Breaker and his son, Cal, reunite after the Civil War to track down a fellow veteran, now a notorious gang leader. Their mission turns dangerous when they find themselves caught between their former friend's outlaw gang and the vigilantes who are taking the law into their own hands. Starring Neal McDonough (Yellowstone, Captain America), Casper Van Dien (Starship Troopers, Tarzan), Steven R. McQueen (The Vampire Diaries, Chicago Fire), and Annabeth Gish (X-Files, The Haunting of Hill House).

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E3 Midnight Cowboys In the middle of the night, a group of wayward yearlings ends up on a city baseball field, and the county sheriff asks the guys to help get them roped. Bubba's father-in-law offers him an office job, but taking the position would require him to leave the ranch in Alabama and move to neighboring Mississippi. Cody worries that he is running out of room for his growing family, forcing him to consider a new house. And, Booger gives a few lessons to a young boy who wants to learn about the cowboy way of life.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E4 The Friend Zone A shipment from Faith Cattle Company is in jeopardy when the truck gets stuck in a ditch. It's a race against the clock to get the cattle to the buyer or risk losing the deal. Bubba teams up with his father-in-law to build a custom grill prototype in hopes of launching a new business venture. Cody decides to sell a horse to help fund his dream home, but he receives an offer that is less than ideal. After getting relationship advice from Bubba and Cody, Booger ends up on a date with his best friend Ashley.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E2 Woman from Hog Ridge When Lucas and Mark catch two young men stealing a horse, Lucas is forced into a shootout. He captures one of the men, but Ma Boyle's son is killed in the gunfight. Soon after the killing, the Boyle clan comes to hang the person responsible.

programme.title: County Line
programme.desc: When his best friend, Sheriff Clint Thorne (Jeff Fahey, Texas Rising, Justified), is brutally gunned down, former neighboring county sheriff, Alden Rockwell (Tom Wopat, The Dukes Of Hazzard, Longmire) is left with many questions and no answers. After the investigation stalls and his replacement, Sheriff Preston (Grant Goodeve, Eight is Enough, Dynasty) turns a blind eye, Alden takes the case into his own hands. Uncovering a web of crime, deceit, and corruption that spreads through two counties, Alden is caught in a deadly criminal network with no backup, no badge, and local diner owner, Maddie (Patricia Richardson, Home Improvement, The West Wing) as his only ally. Seeking justice at any cost, Alden must find out who's behind this criminal enterprise, even if some lines must be crossed.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S2 E15 The Courtship Joe and Hoss travel to Sacramento to visit Helen, the widow of Ben's friend, Josh Layton. Hoss falls in love with her and intends to marry her. All are thrilled except Adam, who has reason to believe that she is using Hoss.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S2 E16 The Spitfire Joe finds a man burning Ponderosa land and shoots him in self-defense. Joe is left with the responsibility of the man's daughter. He brings her to the Ponderosa, unaware of her outlaw kin searching for her.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E3 Andrew Henry: Man of His Word Though Andrew Henry has little experience when he partners in a trapping expedition, he pledges his word to complete the risky venture. As Blackfeet warriors close in, he must weigh his personal integrity against the lives of the men he leads.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E4 Ada Curnutt, U.S. Deputy Marshal After being sworn in as one of Oklahoma's first female deputy marshals, Ada Curnutt volunteers to track down two killers-turned-counterfeiters and concocts a cunning plan to bring them to justice without using a gun.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E2 Bass Reeves: A Father's Justice After a man murders his wife in a jealous rage and goes on the run, local lawmen are stunned when legendary Marshal Bass Reeves accepts responsibility for bringing the killer to justice...because the murderer is none other than Reeves' own son.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S7 E11 Johnny Brassbuttons Scout Johnny Brassbuttons leads a wagon train, including a widow and her companion, to meet a stagecoach in Globe. Although they have permission to travel through Apache land, disaster strikes when Indians ambush them.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E11 The Apprentice Sheriff Dan Willard fills in as deputy while Marshal Micah Torrance is away on business. Meanwhile, Texas cowhands come to town looking for fun and relaxation. When Dan tries to prove that his toughness, those actions backfire.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E12 The Angry Gun Lucas and Mark, returning after selling their herd, share the stagecoach trip with a marshal and his prisoner, Johnny Cotton. Johnny's gang stops and robs the stagecoach, while Johnny steals Lucas' gun and profits. Lucas is forced to track him down.

programme.title: Yuma
programme.desc: When a tough, veteran United States marshal is sent to clean up a down-and-dirty Western town, he faces a scheme to remove his authority and ruin his reputation.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E31 Stopover A brutal snowstorm makes the roads impassable and forces a stagecoach to stop at the McCain Ranch. Lucas gives the passengers shelter, but little does he know a dance hall girl, a drunk, and a famous gunslinger are his guests.

programme.title: Kansas Pacific
programme.desc: With talks of a Civil War brewing, Southern saboteurs know they must keep Northern forces from using the U.S. train system. They devise a daring and dangerous plan to stop and capture a railroad engine, preventing the completion of a railroad line.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E20 End of the Hunt Lucas wants to kill an old enemy, Reef Jackson, who is coming to North Fork. In the past, Jackson shot Lucas in the back and tried to steal his wife. Micah puts Lucas in jail to stop him from getting his revenge. Meanwhile, Mark wants to bag an elk.

programme.title: County Line
programme.desc: When his best friend, Sheriff Clint Thorne (Jeff Fahey, Texas Rising, Justified), is brutally gunned down, former neighboring county sheriff, Alden Rockwell (Tom Wopat, The Dukes Of Hazzard, Longmire) is left with many questions and no answers. After the investigation stalls and his replacement, Sheriff Preston (Grant Goodeve, Eight is Enough, Dynasty) turns a blind eye, Alden takes the case into his own hands. Uncovering a web of crime, deceit, and corruption that spreads through two counties, Alden is caught in a deadly criminal network with no backup, no badge, and local diner owner, Maddie (Patricia Richardson, Home Improvement, The West Wing) as his only ally. Seeking justice at any cost, Alden must find out who's behind this criminal enterprise, even if some lines must be crossed.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S2 E15 The Courtship Joe and Hoss travel to Sacramento to visit Helen, the widow of Ben's friend, Josh Layton. Hoss falls in love with her and intends to marry her. All are thrilled except Adam, who has reason to believe that she is using Hoss.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S2 E16 The Spitfire Joe finds a man burning Ponderosa land and shoots him in self-defense. Joe is left with the responsibility of the man's daughter. He brings her to the Ponderosa, unaware of her outlaw kin searching for her.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E3 Andrew Henry: Man of His Word Though Andrew Henry has little experience when he partners in a trapping expedition, he pledges his word to complete the risky venture. As Blackfeet warriors close in, he must weigh his personal integrity against the lives of the men he leads.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E4 Ada Curnutt, U.S. Deputy Marshal After being sworn in as one of Oklahoma's first female deputy marshals, Ada Curnutt volunteers to track down two killers-turned-counterfeiters and concocts a cunning plan to bring them to justice without using a gun.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E2 Bass Reeves: A Father's Justice After a man murders his wife in a jealous rage and goes on the run, local lawmen are stunned when legendary Marshal Bass Reeves accepts responsibility for bringing the killer to justice...because the murderer is none other than Reeves' own son.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S7 E11 Johnny Brassbuttons Scout Johnny Brassbuttons leads a wagon train, including a widow and her companion, to meet a stagecoach in Globe. Although they have permission to travel through Apache land, disaster strikes when Indians ambush them.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E11 The Apprentice Sheriff Dan Willard fills in as deputy while Marshal Micah Torrance is away on business. Meanwhile, Texas cowhands come to town looking for fun and relaxation. When Dan tries to prove that his toughness, those actions backfire.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E12 The Angry Gun Lucas and Mark, returning after selling their herd, share the stagecoach trip with a marshal and his prisoner, Johnny Cotton. Johnny's gang stops and robs the stagecoach, while Johnny steals Lucas' gun and profits. Lucas is forced to track him down.

programme.title: Yuma
programme.desc: When a tough, veteran United States marshal is sent to clean up a down-and-dirty Western town, he faces a scheme to remove his authority and ruin his reputation.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E31 Stopover A brutal snowstorm makes the roads impassable and forces a stagecoach to stop at the McCain Ranch. Lucas gives the passengers shelter, but little does he know a dance hall girl, a drunk, and a famous gunslinger are his guests.

programme.title: Kansas Pacific
programme.desc: With talks of a Civil War brewing, Southern saboteurs know they must keep Northern forces from using the U.S. train system. They devise a daring and dangerous plan to stop and capture a railroad engine, preventing the completion of a railroad line.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E20 End of the Hunt Lucas wants to kill an old enemy, Reef Jackson, who is coming to North Fork. In the past, Jackson shot Lucas in the back and tried to steal his wife. Micah puts Lucas in jail to stop him from getting his revenge. Meanwhile, Mark wants to bag an elk.

programme.title: Angel and the Badman
programme.desc: When a gunslinger with a bad disposition is nursed back to health and desired by a Quaker girl, he finds himself having to choose between his lawless life or the peaceful world of his newfound love.

programme.title: F Troop
programme.desc: S2 E1 The Singing Mountie A singing Mountie comes to Fort Courage looking for Agarn's look-alike Canadian cousin, Lucky Pierre Agarniere, a fur trapper accused of stealing furs. Agarn tries to clear his cousin's name and uncover the truth.

programme.title: F Troop
programme.desc: S2 E2 How to Be Without Really Trying When Major Bradley visits Fort Courage the F Troop learns that they all will be transferred, except for Corporal Agarn, who must stay and train the G Troop. Agarn quickly finds out the new troops are more incompetent than his comrades in F Troop.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E21 The Exchange Teaspoon arranges for the hanging of gunslinger, Emory Pike, guilty of murder and bank robbery. However, things get complicated when Pike's brother, Frank, takes Amanda O'Connel, who is like a daughter to Teaspoon, hostage.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E35 Blood Brothers Lucas finds a wounded man, takes him to the North Fork doctor, and gives blood to help save the stranger's life. Marshal Torrance won't help as he says he knows the man and wants him dead. Things become more complicated when vigilantes ride to town.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E36 Stranger at Night Coming home from school, Mark stumbles upon a dead man's body. Lucas discovers he was stabbed and the only clue is a belt with the initials R.M. Lucas leaves Mark with Artemus Quarles, a cousin who is visiting. Quarles, however, is not who he seems.

programme.title: The Gambler
programme.desc: When a card shark receives a letter from a distant and troubled son, he travels to rescue the boy and his mother. During a train ride, the gambler meets a friendly, prideful young card player and shares his wisdom.

programme.title: The Big Trees
programme.desc: A timber baron plans to take advantage of a new law and make millions. Making his money turns out to be harder than he ever thought when the Quakers who own the land refuse to sell their precious trees.

programme.title: High Lonesome
programme.desc: A sudden and swift series of murders occurs in southwestern Texas, sending Big Bend country into a frenzy. All parties are suspicious of a young rambler who just moved to the area, believing his presence must be related to the crimes.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E4 Border Showdown Cheyenne and Smitty travel to Mexico to bring a gang of outlaws accused of killing Cheyenne's close friend to justice. However, after they arrive, they discover that the small Mexican town is under the rule of the gang's leader.

programme.title: Angel and the Badman
programme.desc: When a gunslinger with a bad disposition is nursed back to health and desired by a Quaker girl, he finds himself having to choose between his lawless life or the peaceful world of his newfound love.

programme.desc: S2 E1 The Singing Mountie A singing Mountie comes to Fort Courage looking for Agarn's look-alike Canadian cousin, Lucky Pierre Agarniere, a fur trapper accused of stealing furs. Agarn tries to clear his cousin's name and uncover the truth.

programme.title: The Gambler
programme.desc: When a card shark receives a letter from a distant and troubled son, he travels to rescue the boy and his mother. During a train ride, the gambler meets a friendly, prideful young card player and shares his wisdom.

programme.title: The Big Trees
programme.desc: A timber baron plans to take advantage of a new law and make millions. Making his money turns out to be harder than he ever thought when the Quakers who own the land refuse to sell their precious trees.

programme.title: High Lonesome
programme.desc: A sudden and swift series of murders occurs in southwestern Texas, sending Big Bend country into a frenzy. All parties are suspicious of a young rambler who just moved to the area, believing his presence must be related to the crimes.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E17 The Retired Gun Wes Carney, a famous gunfighter, and his new wife Clair move to North Fork. They open a store and settle down. However, three outlaws come to town to challenge him. Carney refuses and they ransack his store, forcing him to put his gunbelt back on.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S3 E8 Aged to Perfection The guys saddle up to rope in a renegade heifer before she tears up a neighbor's field. Booger creates a birthday to remember for his 85-year-old grandma, including her first ride in a convertible, a photo shoot and a huge surprise party with a special guest. Cody goes on a personal publicity tour to promote the opening of their pop-up restaurant. On the eve of their big opening, the neglected details could turn the cowboys' restaurant dream into a nightmare. Bubba forgets a key ingredient, Cody's efforts bring in an unexpected number of hungry customers, and they run out of their signature steak. It's a night to make the guys wonder if they'd be better off just sticking to The Cowboy Way of life they love.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: It's a rope-swinging episode of The Cowboy Way! After their restaurant venture, each of the cowboys takes some quality time to reconnect with family and discuss their futures. Cody decides to make the ranch high-tech, but will it be a success or will he get his wires crossed? Bubba plays locksmith for Booger's truck. A missing cow gets stuck in the woods. The guys use Booger's annual horse clinic as a way to give back to the community. And get ready for matchmaking the cowboy way! When the boys set up a mixer for bachelors Frankie and Hodge, speed-dating turns into a literal horse race to win the ladies' affections.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E8 The Safe Guard A new bank opens in North Fork, and banker John Hamilton hires Floyd Doniger for security. However, problems arise when robbers who followed the new safe into town discover their old pal Floyd is the bank guard.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E9 The Sister Rebecca Snipe returns to North Fork after an extended visit. Lucas' son Mark is smitten and plans to play matchmaker for his dad. However, the Snipe brothers get involved to make sure Lucas is good enough for Rebecca.

programme.title: They Call Me Trinity
programme.desc: When a land-hungry rancher sends his bullies to harass peace-loving Mormons into giving up their fertile valley, a lazy gunfighter with a very quick draw and amazing accuracy, along with his horse-thieving brother, come to the settlers' rescue.

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: It's the late 1800s and a marshal must stop a volatile and growing conflict between homesteaders and cattle drivers in his small town on the Kansas frontier.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E14 Big Ghost Basin Cheyenne finds a dead man's body and strange signs from the mysterious killer on a trail to Crowheart. When he arrives in town with the body, the townspeople suspect him to be a member of the rustler gang that's responsible.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E15 Born Bad Cheyenne follows a thief and killer into a small town where the killer's father is the sheriff. After the sheriff resigns, Cheyenne takes the job. Problems arise when he falls for a girl who is the sister of the killer and daughter of the sheriff.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S2 E11 The Savage On his way to Nevada, Adam rides up on some Indians wanting to harm a white woman they believe is a mountain spirit. They escape but Adam is wounded. The woman nurses him back to health but the tribe is on their trail.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E9 The Long Goodbye Stubborn Grandpa Fogerty lives in a rundown house with his grandson, Woody. Lucas tries to get the old man to send the boy to school. The ladies of North Fork want Woody removed from the home and ask Lucas to help them.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E10 The Shattered Idol Famous writer Mark Twain visits North Fork and Mark, who idolizes him, is hurt by his rudeness. Lucas intervenes and discovers the source of Twain's bitterness comes from personal tragedy. Later, both Marks become friends.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E11 Long Gun from Tucson A killer, John Holliver, and his followers come to North Fork looking for revenge. All of the residents are terrified since they ran him out of town five years earlier. Lucas, now acting marshal, realizes that he must face Holliver and his men alone.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E12 The High Country Two mountain men, Ambrose and Gorwin, come to the McCain Ranch. Ambrose is captivated by Lucas' rifle but Lucas won't trade it. After Gorwin is killed trying to steal it, the family holds Lucas accountable.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S4 E1 Big Deal The guys are back in the saddle on The Cowboy Way! Their dreams of making it big have finally arrived with a million-dollar business opportunity, but only if they can come up with half the cash. While the cowboys struggle with how to raise the money, Bubba is torn if he should ask his father-in-law for help. Booger teaches Matthew to be a real cowboy and gives him his first pony! But when Jaclyn misses this big milestone, she questions if her demanding job is keeping her from her family. And finally, Cody's mission to teach kids about the importance of ranching leads him to take on the Cattlemen's Association. How far will he go to make his point?

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S4 E2 New Sheriff in Town It's back to basics on The Cowboy Way as the guys work to rotate cattle off a lightning-struck field to fresh grass, but the routine wrangle suddenly heads south as the herd scatters, jumping and taking down part of a fence. Kaley wonders about finances and if she should find work, while Bubba invests in a starter herd for daughter Andie's Cowgirl College Fund. Jaclyn rushes to prepare for Matthew's 4th birthday party and anxiously waits for news after a job interview. Booger's parents have a special birthday surprise for Matthew. As the Cattlemen's Association Ambassador, Cody gets a call from a local farmer and meets their autistic son Tristan. Misty gives Cody an idea how to share the cowboy way lifestyle with this special boy.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E10 New Orleans Menace Wealthy Frenchman Cesar Tiffauges, who is used to getting whatever he desires, wants to buy the McCain Ranch. Tiffauges, a sadistic man, abuses his followers regularly with beatings. When Lucas refuses, his son Mark becomes the object of cruelty.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E11 The Apprentice Sheriff Dan Willard fills in as deputy while Marshal Micah Torrance is away on business. Meanwhile, Texas cowhands come to town looking for fun and relaxation. When Dan tries to prove that his toughness, those actions backfire.

programme.title: F Troop
programme.desc: S2 E7 Yellow Bird Yellow Bird is a white woman who was abducted as a child by Apaches and raised as one of their own. Her father, a wealthy Texan, finds her and wants her to return home. She agrees, but only if she can marry Captain Parmenter in the process.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E9 Law Comes to No Man's Land Marshal Chris Madsen helps newly appointed judge John Buford bring law and order to Oklahoma's Panhandle in an area known as No Man's Land. After escorting a wagon train of prisoners to Beaver City, they set up their first courthouse inside a saloon.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E12 The Battle of Stone Corral When bandits rob a train and gun down a pursuing marshal, they spark one of the largest manhunts in California history. After taking shelter behind the crumbling walls of Stone Corral, they make their final stand against a hail of gunfire.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S4 E5 Bill Hamilton: The Last Mountain Man Coming of age on the frontier, young Bill Hamilton joins Old Bill Williams on an epic adventure during the final days of the fur trade. The last true mountain man, Hamilton's courage is tested when he faces an epic showdown with Bannock warriors.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E11 The Play's the Thing Cody joins a troupe of traveling actors, unaware that the group's members are Confederates who are plotting to assassinate U.S. General Fremont. When the riders discover the truth, they ride to Fort Laramie to save Fremont from getting murdered.

programme.title: America Says
programme.desc: Two teams of friends and family race against a clock to guess how America filled in the blanks on a series of survey questions. John Michael Higgins hosts.. ¤ Produced in: 2018. , ¤ Category: Game Show, Family, Comedy, Reality

programme.title: Chain Reaction
programme.desc: Writing Divas and the Quail Family compete to form chains composed of two-word phrases.. ¤ Produced in: 2022. , ¤ Category: Game Show, Entertainment

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: Three competitors must pit their wits and face off against the Chaser, a ruthless quiz genius determined to stop them from winning cash prizes.. ¤ Produced in: 2021. , ¤ Category: Reality, Game Show

programme.title: The Wall
programme.desc: Two-person teams answer questions for cash and prizes.. ¤ Produced in: 2017. , ¤ Category: Game Show, Reality Competition, Reality
